pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācaritvā saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.3: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.5: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarissati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.6: ‘ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā’”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.7: saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarasi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.8: ‘ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.11: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarissasi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.12: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.16: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ ropetu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.20: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.21: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ ropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.24: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.26: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakassa ropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.29: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.30: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.31: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.33: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicaranto—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.5: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.8: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.12: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno vihesakaṁ ropetu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.16: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.17: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno vihesakaṁ ropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.20: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.22: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno vihesakassa ropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.25: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.26: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.27: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.2: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati— “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti. Eso aññavādako nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.4: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti. Eso vihesako nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.5.1: Aropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.6: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.7: Aropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.8: Ropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.9: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.10: Ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.2: Dhammakamme vematiko aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.4: “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṁ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.5: “saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.6: “adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṁ karissatī”ti na katheti;
